text:
Awesome, I'll take a look at the video when I have some spare time :smiley:
And keeping motivation high is sometimes hard, it's harder for personal stuff than at work.
Deadlines become a great motivator to get work done, inspiration and creativity is a little harder. I try to have balance in my life and in my mental health to keep my productivity up.  But I also have low moments where I just don't have the motivation to work on my own things. When that happens, I try and break my patterns to reengage my head.
